description:
The sacred treasure "Garm" will be added.
Enjoy the new battle experience!
Note: New Normal Magic and Charge Magic will be available for use.

■Content
Sacred Treasure "Garm"

■How to use
You can change sacred treasures from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Sacred Treasures".

*This content is only applicable to the WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate, it cannot be used in WARRIORS OROCHI 4 base game.
name: Sacred Treasure `Garm`
